Message: Fix CustomGateway -> CustomerGateway

Fix VPC security group rule bugs

- Fix bugs with SecurityGroupEgress and SecurityGroupIngress.
  - They are really only AWSProperty and not AWSObject derivatives.
  - They were generating bad JSON for VPC security group ingress/egress rules.
- Added workaround for AWS bug with SecurityGroupEgress rules.
  - Egress rules targeting a security group do not respect
     DestinationSecurityGroupId.
  - You have to use SourceSecurityGroupId to create these types of rules.
  - Added SourceSecurityGroupId to hash of allowed properties for
    SecurityGroupEgress.
  - This is a known AWS bug with EC2/CloudFormation APIs since mid-2012.
- This is a merge of Will's patch
Fix pep8 whitespace
Fix Python 3.3 compatibility
Fix empty param issue and print a nicer error message

Fix a missed portion of a pull request patch

This patch fixes:
    Workaround for a bug in CloudFormation and EC2 where the
    DestinationSecurityGroupId property is ignored causing
    egress rules targeting a security group to be ignored.
    Using SourceSecurityGroupId instead works fine even in
    egress rules. AWS have known about this bug for a while.
Fix Attributes validator for ELB Policies

Fixing due to an error that was in the AWS docs

Working with Amazon support on this - the documentation is wrong, and
the LoadBalancerPorts argument isn't required.

to be dropped. This change converts it into a simple iteration. Note: while it
would be ideal to add travis support to prevent further regressions the amount
of change in the tests is prohibitive at this time. Python 2.6.9 support is
"best effort" for now.

Use location constants for creating bucket

`create_bucket` requires `location` parameter to be a constant from
`boto.s3.connection.Location` and there is no `us-east-1` or
`eu-west-1`, only empty string or `EU`.

It should fix #408.

Logs SubscriptionFilter

Hi,

From the doc: 
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-resource-logs-subscriptionfilter.html

    An IAM role that grants CloudWatch Logs permission to put data into the specified Amazon Kinesis stream. For Lambda and CloudWatch Logs destinations, don't specify this property because CloudWatch Logs gets the necessary permissions from the destination resource.

    Required: No

    Type: String

    Update requires: Replacement


AWS::Logs::SubscriptionFilter RoleArn is mandatory in the library but not on AWS and gives you an error:  destinationArn for vendor lambda cannot be used with roleArn

Import JSON Templates (#468)

This new Template subclass makes it possible to import most Cloudformation templates as JSON and parse them as Troposphere objects. This is different from cfn2py in that it's not trying to write actual python code, but rather instantiate the actual objects without the need to edit it afterwards.

There are probably a few tropo-specific AWSHelperFns that won't be parsed correctly, but the ones included in the tests/examples_output are all supported. I believe an effort should be done to normalize the helper functions into something discoverable with a consistent use - but I have yet to really ponder on that issue.
List of modified files: Autoscaling.py, test_examples_template_generator.py, __init__.py, cloudformation.py, emr.py, s3.py, template_generator.py

Fix AssociationParameters Value type to list of strings (#518)

According to
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-ec2-instance-ssmassociations-associationparameters.html,

not a string. This was causing instance creation failure on templates
attempting to use SsmAssociations.

Fix TemplateGenerator import logic. (#533)

* Fix TemplateGenerator import logic.

template_generator.py was incorrectly invoking pkgutil.walk_packages,
passing in the filepath directly rather than as a list of paths. By
coincidence, this resulted in the current directory being processed
instead, which allowed the tests to accidentally pass.

Fixes #532

* Fix Template Generator more cleanly.

Rather than iterate over all packages in the modules directory, just
iterate over the troposphere directory instead.

* Remove string startwith 'troposphere' check.

Allow HelperFn in UpdatePolicy for ASG (#588)

If you tried to use an AWSHelperFn object in an UpdatePolicy for an ASG,
you would run into issues because of the extra validation.  This
disables the extra validation whenever the UpdatePolicy is an
AWSHelperFn, which is in line with the way troposphere usually handles
these things.

Include resource title in required attr exception

Based on helping with this issue:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/40118794/dynamically-create-n-number-of-ec2-instances-with-troposphere/40122167?noredirect=1#comment67537659_40122167

Now, if a resource is missing a required attribute, and that resource
has a title, we'll include it in the exception.

ValueError: Resource ImageId required in type AWS::EC2::Instance

vs

ValueError: Resource ImageId required in type AWS::EC2::Instance (title: MyInstance)

Remove `title` validation. Fixes #428 (#605)

The title specified in troposphere is not the actual physical resource name and should be validated as such.

Fixes RecordColumns cardinality for InputSchema and ReferenceSchema (#859)

Both InputSchema[0] and ReferenceSchema[1] should be a list of RecordColumn
instead of a RecordColumns

[0]: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-kinesisanalytics-application-inputschema.html
[1]: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-kinesisanalytics-applicationreferencedatasource-referenceschema.html

Fixes ApplicationOutput/Output cardinality (#863)

The Output[0] property should be an object instead of a list of objects.
The official documentation is not clear about this but creating an
ApplicationOutput with a list of Output objects will fail with the message:

Property validation failure: [Value of property {/Output} does not match type {Object}]

while creating an ApplicationOutput with an Ouput object will succeed.

[0]: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-resource-kinesisanalytics-applicationoutput.html

Fix validation failure for fifo queues in the case that no QueueName is specified.  Note that Cloudformation *does* now automatically give a QueueName ending with .fifo in this case, contrary to the comment on PR #757.

changed to

from

cfn-flip 1.0.2 fixes the issue where zero-prefixed strings are not quoted which confuses the CloudFormation service

Allow multiple NoValue properties in mutually_exclusive (#1050)

* Allow multiple NoValue properties in mutually_exclusive

mutually_exclusive ignores the value of properties, only looking at
whether or not they are defined. This causes a bug where you cannot
have two mutually exclusive properties, even if the value of those
properties is AWS::NoValue, which is allowed by cloudformation.

Update integer_list_item to always cast value to an int for comparison (#1192)

Current code seems to assume positive_integer(x) converts to int, while it doesn't.
This problem generates 'Integer must be one of following...' error when the value is in the list because it tries to find a string in an array of ints. 

Other methods such as integer_range do cast correctly, integer_list_item should work the same.

Ran into this issue when creating a LogGroup object with RetentionInDays set to u'7' which should be valid. Passing a number also doesn't work because the expected value should be a string.

Fix several problems in wafv2

- Several classes were subclasses of AWSObject when they should be
  subclasses of AWSProperty.

- Several classes have arguments that are lists. These args were defined
  via intermediate classes that in turn defined the lists. This was incorrect.
  The classes should accept the lists directly.

  I fixed the list arguments for these classes:

    GeoMatchStatement
    AndStatementOne
    OrStatementOne
    AndStatementTwo
    OrStatementTwo

  I remove these unnecessary intermediate list classes:

    CountryCodes
    StatementTwos
    StatementThrees

CHANGELOG.rst Formatting Fixes (#1983)

Changes:

- Silenced a Sphinx error by closing an unclosed emphasis markup.
- Fixed 3.0.0 release notes formatting.

The 3.0.0 releases notes were mostly rendering as just a paragraph, or
an an incomplete list with unexpected indentation. These changes fix the
formatting so that the 3.0.0 release notes Breaking Changes, and Changes
lists are now subsections of the 3.0.0 section. The second bullet point
in the Breaking Changes section was also throwing unexpected indentation
errors. This has been resolved now, and the section is rendering as a
literal box as expected.

Fixed NetworkFirewall::LoggingConfiguration (#1984)

* Fixed LoggingConfiguration by introducing LoggingConfigurationProperty.
Fix black formatting/isort
Update SageMaker per 2021-12-03 changes and fix SageMaker::Device

Fix some lint errors
Fix examples where variables were aliasing classes
List of modified files: Autoscaling.py, AutoscalingHTTPRequests.py, CloudTrail.py, Lambda.py, VPC_With_VPN_Connection.py, VPC_single_instance_in_subnet.py, WAF_Common_Attacks_Sample.py, WAF_Regional_Common_Attacks_Sample.py

Message:
Restore AWS::ECS::TaskDefinition AuthorizationConfig (Fixes #1997)

EFSVolumeConfigurationFix.AuthorizationConfig has both a PrimitiveType of
Json and a Type of AuthorizationConfig. The generator prefers PrimitiveType
so this change removes it to allow emitting AuthorizationConfig.
Fix backward compat issue with ECS HostVolumeProperties => Host
Fix backward compat issue with CodeDeploy RevisionLocation => Revision

Various changes to the code generator

- Allow using a file for a list of service names
- Try to handle Tags more gracefully
- Dump info on a common KeyError
Fix copy/paste issue resulting in incorrect ECS validator assignment (Fixes #2000)

Automatically correct Resource/Property dups in the code generator

Previously duplicates names for a Resource and Property needed to be
handled in the jsonpatch phase. This change automatically detects and
corrects these dups. Also tweaked some of the debug output.
Fix SNS Subscription resource type

Remove unneeded properties that should not be emitted

Some properties are associated with resource attributes as returned from
Fn::GetAtt. This change fixes up via jsonpatch to remove these properties.
List of modified files: appintegrations.py, efs.py, events.py, lightsail.py, macie.py, quicksight.py, route53recoverycontrol.py, s3outposts.py, ssm.py, wafv2.py, workspaces.py

Message:

- Emit any leftover properties not "seen" through traversing the resources

- Fix output for lists of primitive types
- Output more information when there is a JsonPatchConflict
Fixup some incorrect Tags types
List of modified files: fis.py, amazonmq.py, fis.py, greengrassv2.py, nimblestudio.py, quicksight.py, resiliencehub.py, robomaker.py, servicecatalogappregistry.py

Message: Auto-generate Route53Resolver
Fix typo in ECS validator name

Reimplement WAFv2 Statement validation

The current WAFv2 works around a cyclic issue by using copies of objects
to allow hierarchical use. This change works around this issue by using
property validators instead. This does break backward compatibility with
the following class renames:
  - AndStatementOne, AndStatementTwo => AndStatement
  - NotStatementOne, NotStatementTwo => NotStatement
  - OrStatementOne, OrStatementTwo => OrStatement
  - RateBasedStatementOne, RateBasedStatementTwo => RateBasedStatement
  - StatementOne, StatementTwo, StatementThree => Statement
List of modified files: CHANGELOG.rst, gen.py, wafv2.py, test_wafv2.py, wafv2.py, wafv2.py

Message: Fix black formatting

Fix generating constants based on recent use of typing.Final

The use of typing.Final for constants required the generator to look for
AnnAssign (Annotated Assignment) in addition to Assign AST tree nodes.

Automate fixing and generation of standalone types

Most properties have a Properties dictionary but there seems to
be a usage where a property entry just denotes a type specification.
In the past this was worked around by lifting the type information
into the right place. This change attempts to automate this process.

This prevents a "RuntimeError: dictionary changed size during iteration"

Fix EC2::TransitGatewayMulticastDomain.Options conflict

Use MulticastDomainOptions for EC2::TransitGatewayMulticastDomain.Options.

Fix __eq__ protocol (#2197)

If it is not known how to compare objects, `__eq__` should return
NotImplemented instead of False. That way the right side object of the
comparison might possibly take over.
Fix formatting

Object equality fixes (#2200)

- Add __hash__ to the Parameter class
- Disable validation when doing BaseAWSObject object comparison __eq__
Add new OpenSearch instance names to constants.py (Fixes: #2198) (#2199)

Move __hash__ to BaseAWSObject to support objects in dictionaries (Fixes #2204)

PR #2182 added support for troposphere object comparison. Upon release
there was an issue (#2196) where Parameter was not hashable and fixed in
PR #2200. This fix was a minimal one just for Parameter but PR #2204
showed use cases for the base object to be hashable as well.

Remove Tags from EventBridge.Rule (Fixes #2203)

Tags was added to EventBridge.Rule in PR #2158 but it is not
implemented in CloudFormation and causes a rollback when used.

Prefer ECS::Service.LoadBalancer (Fixes #2206)

ECS::TaskSet.LoadBalancer was being emitted but ECS::Service.LoadBalancer
is a superset. This makes the minimal change to keep backward compatibility
(although LoadBalancerName should not be used with TaskSet).

be revisted at the next major version change.

Message: Fix waf_action_type validator type annotation

Fix code gen to ignore object in PropsDictType

To prevent recusrsion issues "object" is patched in as a
generic replacement type. This change prefers to ignore object
for type checking rather than adding object to PropsDictType.

Fix recursive definition in AWS::IoTSiteWise

Work around recursive ItemType introduced in spec 208.0.0.
